mapper.sql: confirm_id, send_code, receive_user, receive_user_code, create_time, create_site_code, waybill_code, box_code, package_barcode, confirm_type, update_time, YN, confirm_status, third_waybill_code, receive_site_code, inspection_user, inspection_user_code, inspection_time, operate_type, pickup_code, operate_time,receive_time,operate_user,operate_user_code
mapper.insert: insert into cen_confirm (confirm_id, send_code, receive_user, receive_user_code, create_time, create_site_code, waybill_code, box_code, package_barcode, confirm_type, update_time, YN, confirm_status, third_waybill_code, receive_site_code, inspection_user, inspection_user_code, inspection_time, operate_type, pickup_code,excute_count, excute_time, operate_time,receive_time,operate_user,operate_user_code ) values (#{confirmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, 1, #{thirdWaybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectionUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pickupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, SYSDATE, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update cen_confirm
update_time=SYSDATE,
receive_user=#{receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_user_code=#{receiveUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_time=#{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receive_site_code=#{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inspection_user=#{inspectionUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inspection_user_code=#{inspectionUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inspection_time=#{inspectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_time=#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_user=#{operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_user_code=#{operateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where YN=1
and operate_time = to_date(to_char(#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and package_barcode=#{packageBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and waybill_code=#{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and confirm_type=#{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} and create_site_code=#{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} and operate_type=#{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
